content: विग्रह् {c9c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To hold or seize, catch hold of; विजगृहे तिसृणां जयिनं पुरां <ls>Ki. 18. 12.</ls> {@--2@} To quarrel, fight, contend; विगृह्य चक्रे नमुचिद्विषा बली य इत्थमस्वास्थ्यमहर्दिवं दिवः <ls>Śi. 1. 51</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 86</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">17. 23</ls>, <ls>Ki. 14. 24.</ls> {@--3@} To divide into parts, separate (into constituent members). {@--4@} To dissolve, analyse, resolve in general. {@--5@} To receive, welcome (as a guest). {@--6@} To perceive, observe. {@--7@} To stretch or spread out.
